report.name: reshist

dataSource.name: Q_ANNEE_TRAITEE
dataSource.select: -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement au format 'MM/AAAA' -- (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) SELECT DECODE( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), NULL, TO_CHAR(datdebex, 'YYYY'), SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4) ) dc_annee_traitee FROM datdebex

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), NULL, TO_CHAR(datdebex, 'YYYY'), SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4) )

dataSource.name: Q_NBJOUR_OUVRE
dataSource.select: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Chargement sous SQL/PLUSS : @G:\Honore\Dvlp\QueryReport\NbjOuvre.sql; -- Query secondaire Etat $RESHIST -- Dans le cadre de $RESHIST: Détermination du nombre de jours ouvrés -- de chacun des mois de l'année traitée -- -- RAPPEL : PARAMETRES DU REPORT $RESHIST : -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement 'MM/AAAA' (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) -- P_PARAM7 : Code DPG (CHAR(7) ) -- P_PARAM8 : Code de la ressource NUMBER(5) dans la base Oracle -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '01') dc_nbjour_ouvre_01, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '02') dc_nbjour_ouvre_02, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '03') dc_nbjour_ouvre_03, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '04') dc_nbjour_ouvre_04, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '05') dc_nbjour_ouvre_05, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '06') dc_nbjour_ouvre_06, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '07') dc_nbjour_ouvre_07, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '08') dc_nbjour_ouvre_08, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '09') dc_nbjour_ouvre_09, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '10') dc_nbjour_ouvre_10, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '11') dc_nbjour_ouvre_11, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '12') dc_nbjour_ouvre_12 FROM dual

dataDescriptor.expression: pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '01' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '02' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '03' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '04' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '05' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '06' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '07' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '08' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '09' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '10' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '11' )
pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre ( SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , '12' )

dataSource.name: Q_RESHIST
dataSource.select: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- @G:\Honore\Dvlp\QueryReport\Reshist.sql; -- Query Etat $RESHIST -- Historique des Consommés des ressources -- PARAMETRES DU REPORT : -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement 'MM/AAAA' (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) -- P_PARAM7 : Code DPG (CHAR(7) ) -- P_PARAM8 : Code de la ressource NUMBER(5) dans la base --DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, ADD_MONTHS(bex.cmensuelle, -1) ), -- bip.adatestatut, bip.astatut, -- ' ' -- ) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- (SELECT pro.divsecgrou dc_coddpg, pro.tires dc_tires, pro.pid dc_codproj, NVL(pro.aist, ' ') dc_soustache, NVL(to_number(lb.typproj),0) dc_type, 'avec' dc_test_conso, MAX(pro.rnom) dc_nomres, MAX(decode(pro.aistty,'FF',pro.factpno,pro.pnom)) dc_nomproj, MAX(str.sigdep) dc_sigdep, MAX(str.sigpole) dc_sigpole, MAX(str.libdsg) dc_libdsg, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Consommations de la ressource par mois --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECODE( LEAST( '01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'01', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_01, DECODE( LEAST( '02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'02', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_02, DECODE( LEAST( '03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'03', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_03, DECODE( LEAST( '04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'04', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_04, DECODE( LEAST( '05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'05', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_05, DECODE( LEAST( '06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'06', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_06, DECODE( LEAST( '07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'07', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_07, DECODE( LEAST( '08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'08', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_08, DECODE( LEAST( '09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'09', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_09, DECODE( LEAST( '10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'10', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_10, DECODE( LEAST( '11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'11', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_11, DECODE( LEAST( '12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'12', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_conso_12, pack_verif_reshist.f_societe_ress( :P_Param6,pro.tires) dc_societe, DECODE( LEAST( '01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'01', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_01, DECODE( LEAST( '02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'02', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_02, DECODE( LEAST( '03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'03', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_03, DECODE( LEAST( '04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'04', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_04, DECODE( LEAST( '05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'05', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_05, DECODE( LEAST( '06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'06', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_06, DECODE( LEAST( '07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'07', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_07, DECODE( LEAST( '08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'08', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_08, DECODE( LEAST( '09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'09', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_09, DECODE( LEAST( '10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'10', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_10, DECODE( LEAST( '11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'11', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_11, DECODE( LEAST( '12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ),'12', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires,pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)),0) dc_abs_12 FROM struct_info str, datdebex bex, ligne_bip lb, proplus pro WHERE -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec struct_info pour avoir les libellés DPG -------------------------------------------------------------- pro.divsecgrou = str.codsg (+) --------------------------------------------------------------- -- jointure avec ligne_bip pour avoir le type du projet -------------------------------------------------------------------- AND pro.pid=lb.pid -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restriction suivant Parametres du report -------------------------------------------------------------- &P_WHERE GROUP BY pro.divsecgrou, pro.tires, pro.pid, NVL(pro.aist, ' '), NVL(to_number(lb.typproj),0) ) UNION (SELECT situ.codsg dc_coddpg, situ.ident dc_tires, '' dc_codproj, '' dc_soustache, 0 dc_type, 'sans' dc_test_conso, MAX(res.rnom) dc_nomres, '' dc_nomproj, MAX(str.sigdep) dc_sigdep, MAX(str.sigpole) dc_sigpole, MAX(str.libdsg) dc_libdsg, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Ressources sans consommé --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 0 dc_conso_01, 0 dc_conso_02, 0 dc_conso_03, 0 dc_conso_04, 0 dc_conso_05, 0 dc_conso_06, 0 dc_conso_07, 0 dc_conso_08, 0 dc_conso_09, 0 dc_conso_10, 0 dc_conso_11, 0 dc_conso_12, pack_verif_reshist.f_societe_ress( :P_Param6,situ.ident) dc_societe, 0 dc_abs_01, 0 dc_abs_02, 0 dc_abs_03, 0 dc_abs_04, 0 dc_abs_05, 0 dc_abs_06, 0 dc_abs_07, 0 dc_abs_08, 0 dc_abs_09, 0 dc_abs_10, 0 dc_abs_1, 0 dc_abs_12 FROM struct_info str, datdebex bex, ressource res, situ_ress situ WHERE -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec struct_info pour avoir les libellés DPG -------------------------------------------------------------- situ.codsg = str.codsg (+) AND situ.ident NOT IN (select p.tires from proplus p where p.tires=situ.ident and to_number(to_char(p.cdeb,'yyyy'))=to_number(SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4)) ) AND situ.ident=res.ident -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restriction suivant Parametres du report -------------------------------------------------------------- &P_WHERE_1 GROUP BY situ.codsg, situ.ident ) ORDER BY 7,8,1,5,2,3,4

dataDescriptor.expression: MAX ( str.sigdep )
MAX ( str.sigpole )
MAX ( str.libdsg )
pack_verif_reshist.f_societe_ress ( : P_Param6 , pro.tires )
MAX ( pro.rnom )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '01' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '02' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '03' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '04' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '05' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '06' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '07' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '08' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '09' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '10' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '11' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '12' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_abs ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )
NVL ( pro.aist , ' ' )
NVL ( to_number ( lb.typproj ) , 0 )
MAX ( decode ( pro.aistty , 'FF' , pro.factpno , pro.pnom ) )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '01' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '02' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '03' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '04' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '05' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '06' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '07' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '08' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '09' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '10' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '11' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '12' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

textSegment.string: Ss total JH productifs ou absences facturées

function.name: afterpform
cf_tot_sous_tacheformula
function.textSource: function CF_TOT_SOUS_TACHEFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :dc_conso_01 + :dc_conso_02 + :dc_conso_03 + :dc_conso_04 + :dc_conso_05 + :dc_conso_06 + :dc_conso_07 + :dc_conso_08 + :dc_conso_09 + :dc_conso_10 + :dc_conso_11 + :dc_conso_12 ; return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_ress_consoformula
function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOT_RESS_CONSOFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_01 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_02 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_03 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_04 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_05 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_06 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_07 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_08 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_09 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_10 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_11 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_12; return(l_res); end;

function.textSource: function CF_TOT_ABSFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :dc_abs_01 + :dc_abs_02 + :dc_abs_03 + :dc_abs_04 + :dc_abs_05 + :dc_abs_06 + :dc_abs_07 + :dc_abs_08 + :dc_abs_09 + :dc_abs_10 + :dc_abs_11 + :dc_abs_12 ; return(l_res); end;
